module.title: daonnan
module.p: daonnan is a frequency adverb meaning always.

li.gd: Rè nam bliadhnachan sin cuideachd, bha Domhnull daonnan an sàs ann an dealbh-chluichean Gàidhlig, agus a’ dèanamh deagh ainm dha fhéin anns an obair.
li.tr: During those days as well, Donald was always involved in Gaelic plays, and making a good name for himself in his work.

li.gd: Mar bu tric’ ’s e geansaidh iasgair agus seann bhriogais a bhiodh air, oir bha e daonnan ag obair mu eathraichean is iasg.
li.tr: He usually would have on a fisherman’s jersey and old trousers, because he was always working around boats and fish.
